south-pacific.name: South Pacific
south-pacific.description: Pristine coral atolls and pelagic encounters

fiji.name: Fiji
fiji.description: The soft coral capital of the world, famous for shark dives and vibrant reefs.

french-polynesia.name: French Polynesia
french-polynesia.description: Home to Rangiroa, Fakarava, and thrilling big animal encounters in turquoise lagoons.

solomon-islands.name: Solomon Islands
solomon-islands.description: Remote WWII wrecks, lush reefs, and uncrowded diving.

vanuatu.name: Vanuatu
vanuatu.description: Wreck diving paradise, home to the SS President Coolidge and blue holes.

new-caledonia.name: New Caledonia
new-caledonia.description: Vast barrier reef, UNESCO lagoon, and French island culture.

cook-islands.name: Cook Islands
cook-islands.description: Crystal clear lagoons and relaxed island diving.

tonga.name: Tonga
tonga.description: Swim with humpback whales and explore coral gardens.

samoa.name: Samoa
samoa.description: Lava tubes, drop-offs, and vibrant reefs in a laid-back setting.
